title: I can't hear the game music in Ascension
body: I am not sure why, but I can't hear the native game music in Ascension. I tried disabling/re enabling the sound and muting/unmuting the music. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
I recommend completing a [quick repair of the game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to ensure this isn't causing by missing audio assets.

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kBYWIZ15,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-02T22:00:12.123+0000)
>
> I recommend completing a [quick repair of the game files](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) to ensure this isn't causing by missing audio assets.
> 
> Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.

Your recommendations worked. I repaired the game files as you suggested and voil√†, the Ascension music returned! Thank you very much for your support.
